parameters.name: AccessLogEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable access log collection. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: AccessLogFile
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable access log collection. Valid values:

*   "": disables access log collection.
*   `/dev/stdout`: enables access log collection. Access logs are written to /dev/stdout.

parameters.name: AccessLogFormat
parameters.description: Custom fields of access logs. To set this parameter, you must enable access log collection. Otherwise, you cannot set this parameter. The value must be a JSON string. The following key values must be contained: authority_for, bytes_received, bytes_sent, downstream_local_address, downstream_remote_address, duration, istio_policy_status, method, path, protocol, requested_server_name, response_code, response_flags, route_name, start_time, trace_id, upstream_cluster, upstream_host, upstream_local_address, upstream_service_time, upstream_transport_failure_reason, user_agent, and x_forwarded_for.

parameters.name: AccessLogProject
parameters.description: The SLS project from which access logs are collected.

parameters.name: AccessLogServiceEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable gRPC Access Log Service (ALS) of Envoy. gRPC is short for Google Remote Procedure Call. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: AccessLogServiceHost
parameters.description: The endpoint of Envoy's gRPC ALS.

parameters.name: AccessLogServicePort
parameters.description: The port of Envoy's gRPC ALS.

parameters.name: ApiServerLoadBalancerSpec
parameters.description: The type of the CLB instance that is bound to Istio Pilot. Valid values: `slb.s1.small`, `slb.s2.small`, `slb.s2.medium`, `slb.s3.small`, `slb.s3.medium`, and `slb.s3.large`.

parameters.name: ApiServerPublicEip
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to expose the API server to the Internet. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

> If you set this parameter to `false`, the API server cannot be accessed over the Internet.

parameters.name: AuditProject
parameters.description:
The name of the Log Service project that is used for mesh audit.

Default value: mesh-log-{ASM instance ID}.

parameters.name: AutoRenew
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable auto-renewal for the CLB instance if the CLB instance uses the subscription billing method. Valid values:

- true

- false

parameters.name: AutoRenewPeriod
parameters.description: The auto-renewal period of the CLB instance. This parameter is valid only if the `ChargeType` parameter is set to `PrePay`. If the original subscription period of the CLB instance is less than one year, the value of this parameter indicates the number of months for auto-renewal. If the original subscription period of the CLB instance is more than one year, the value of this parameter indicates the number of years for auto-renewal.

parameters.name: CRAggregationEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to allow the Kubernetes API of clusters on the data plane to access Istio resources. The version of the ASM instance must be V1.9.7.93 or later. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the CLB instance. Valid values:

*   `PayOnDemand`: pay-as-you-go.
*   `PrePay`: subscription.

parameters.name: ClusterSpec
parameters.description:
The edition of the ASM instance. Valid values:

- `standard`: Standard Edition

- `enterprise`: Enterprise Edition

- `ultimate`: Ultimate Edition

parameters.name: ConfigSourceEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the external service registry. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: ConfigSourceNacosID
parameters.description: The instance ID of the Nacos registry.

parameters.name: ControlPlaneLogEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the collection of control plane logs. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: ControlPlaneLogProject
parameters.description: The name of the Log Service project that is used to collect the logs of the control plane.

parameters.name: CustomizedPrometheus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use a custom Prometheus instance. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: CustomizedZipkin
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use a self-managed Zipkin system to collect tracing data. Valid values:

*   `true`: uses a self-managed Zipkin system to collect tracing data.
*   `false`: uses Alibaba Cloud Tracing Analysis to collect tracing data.

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: DNSProxyingEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the DNS proxy feature. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: DubboFilterEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Dubbo Filter. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: Edition
parameters.description: The edition of the ASM instance.

parameters.name: EnableAmbient
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the Ambient Mesh mode for the ASM instance.

parameters.name: EnableAudit
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the mesh audit feature. To enable this feature, make sure that you have activated [Log Service](https://sls.console.aliyun.com/). Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: EnableCRHistory
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the rollback feature for Istio resources. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: EnableSDSServer
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Secret Discovery Service (SDS). Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: ExcludeIPRanges
parameters.description: The IP ranges in CIDR form to be excluded from redirection to the sidecar proxy in the ASM instance.

parameters.name: ExcludeInboundPorts
parameters.description: The inbound ports to be excluded from redirection to the sidecar proxy in the ASM instance. Separate multiple port numbers with commas (,).

parameters.name: ExcludeOutboundPorts
parameters.description: The outbound ports to be excluded from redirection to the sidecar proxy in the ASM instance. Separate multiple port numbers with commas (,).

parameters.name: ExistingCaCert
parameters.description: The existing CA certificate, which is encoded in Base64. This parameter is used in scenarios where you migrate open source Istio to ASM. It specifies the content of the ca-cert.pem file in the istio-ca-secret secret. The secret is in the istio-system namespace of the Kubernetes cluster where the open source Istio is installed.

parameters.name: ExistingCaKey
parameters.description: The existing CA key, which is encoded in Base64. This parameter is used in scenarios where you migrate open source Istio to ASM. It specifies the content of the ca-key.pem file in the istio-ca-secret secret. The secret is in the istio-system namespace of the Kubernetes cluster where the open source Istio is installed.

parameters.name: ExistingCaType
parameters.description:
The type of the existing CA certificate. Valid values:

*   1: Self-signed certificate generated by istiod. The certificate corresponds to the secret named istio-ca-secret in the istio-system namespace. If you use this type of certificate, you must set the `ExistingCaCert` and `ExsitingCaKey` parameters.
*   2: Administrator-specified certificate. For more information, see [plugin ca cert](https://istio.io/latest/docs/tasks/security/cert-management/plugin-ca-cert/). In most cases, the certificate corresponds to the secret named cacerts in the istio-system namespace. If you use this type of certificate, you must set the `ExisingRootCaCert` and `ExisingRootCaKey` parameters.

parameters.name: ExistingRootCaCert
parameters.description: The existing root certificate, which is encoded in Base64.

parameters.name: ExistingRootCaKey
parameters.description: The private key that corresponds to the root certificate, which is encoded in Base64.

parameters.name: FilterGatewayClusterConfig
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable gateway configuration filtering. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: GatewayAPIEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Gateway API. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: GuestCluster
parameters.description: When you create an ASM instance, you can add a cluster to the ASM instance. If you do not specify this parameter, no cluster is added to the ASM instance. The cluster and the ASM instance must be in the same vSwitch of the same VPC and have the same domain name.

parameters.name: IncludeIPRanges
parameters.description: The IP ranges in CIDR form for which traffic is to be redirected to the sidecar proxy in the ASM instance.

parameters.name: IstioVersion
parameters.description: The Istio version of the ASM instance.

parameters.name: KialiEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the mesh topology feature. To enable this feature, make sure that you have enabled Prometheus monitoring. If Prometheus monitoring is disabled, you must set this parameter to `false`.`` Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: LocalityLBConf
parameters.description: The configurations for the access to the nearest instance.

parameters.name: LocalityLoadBalancing
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to route traffic to the nearest instance. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: MSEEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Microservices Engine (MSE). Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: MultiBufferEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable MultiBuffer-based Transport Layer Security (TLS) acceleration. Valid values:

- `true`

- `false`


Default value: `true`

parameters.name: MultiBufferPollDelay
parameters.description: The pull-request latency. Default value: 30. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: MysqlFilterEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable MySQL Filter. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the ASM instance.

parameters.name: OPALimitCPU
parameters.description: The maximum number of CPU cores that are available to the OPA container.

parameters.name: OPALimitMemory
parameters.description: The maximum size of the memory that is available to the OPA container. You can specify the parameter value in the standard quantity representation form used by Kubernetes. 1 Mi equals 1,024 KB.

parameters.name: OPALogLevel
parameters.description: The log level of the OPA container.

parameters.name: OPARequestCPU
parameters.description: The minimum number of CPU cores that are required by the OPA container. You can specify the parameter value in the standard representation form of CPUs in Kubernetes. For example, if you set the value to 1, one CPU core is required.

parameters.name: OPARequestMemory
parameters.description: The minimum size of the memory that is required by the OPA container. You can specify the parameter value in the standard quantity representation form used by Kubernetes. 1 Mi equals 1,024 KB.

parameters.name: OpaEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the OPA plug-in. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: OpenAgentPolicy
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to install the Open Policy Agent (OPA) plug-in. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description: The auto-renewal period of the CLB instance. This parameter is valid only if `ChargeType` is set to `PrePaid`. The value of this parameter indicates the purchased month of the CLB instance when the subscription billing method is used. For example, if the subscription period is one year, set this parameter to 12.

parameters.name: PilotLoadBalancerSpec
parameters.description: The type of the CLB instance that is bound to Istio Pilot. Valid values: `slb.s1.small`, `slb.s2.small`, `slb.s2.medium`, `slb.s3.small`, `slb.s3.medium`, and `slb.s3.large`.

parameters.name: PrometheusUrl
parameters.description: The endpoint of the custom Prometheus instance.

parameters.name: ProxyLimitCPU
parameters.description: The maximum number of CPU cores that are available to the proxy container.

parameters.name: ProxyLimitMemory
parameters.description: The maximum size of the memory that is available to the proxy container.

parameters.name: ProxyRequestCPU
parameters.description: The minimum number of CPU cores that are required by the proxy container.

parameters.name: ProxyRequestMemory
parameters.description: The minimum size of the memory that is required by the proxy container.

parameters.name: RedisFilterEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Redis Filter. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the ASM instance resides.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
Tag of the ASM instance. A tag contains the following information:

*   key: the name of the tag
*   value: the value of the tag

parameters.name: Telemetry
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Prometheus monitoring. We recommend that you use Prometheus Service of [Application Real-Time Monitoring Service (ARMS)](https://arms.console.aliyun.com/). Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: ThriftFilterEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Thrift Filter. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: TraceSampling
parameters.description: The sampling percentage of Tracing Analysis.

parameters.name: Tracing
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the Tracing Analysis feature. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: UseExistingCA
parameters.description: Specifies whether to use an existing CA certificate and private key.

parameters.name: VSwitches
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch to which the ASM instance is connected.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) in which the ASM instance resides.

parameters.name: WebAssemblyFilterEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable WebAssembly Filter. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

Default value: `false`.
